description:
RebootBlocker installs a service that prevents Windows 10 Version 1607 and newer from rebooting after installing Microsoft Updates.

RebootBlocker is suitable for dealing with unwanted reboots. The setup program installs a Windows service that automatically adjusts the "usage time" every hour, so Windows can never restart.
summary: Prevent Windows 10 from reboot after installing Microsoft updates
author: Ulrich Decker
